document_data.name: Alter Beast
document_data.mainbody: '''''Alter beast''''' was a powerful [[arcane magic|arcane]] [[alteration]] [[spell]] that permanently changed a physical aspect of a creature.
document_data.Effects: A creature's anatomy could be modified with this spell through an incredibly painful and detailed process. The subject was unconscious and restrained for the casting. Any changes made with ''alter beast'' could be passed to the creature's offspring.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required as a [[material component]] two strands of [[gold]] [[wire]] twisted together to cast. A full wizard's laboratoy was also needed for all of the spell's preparations.
document_data.History: [[Hssthak]], a [[sarrukh]] [[mummy]], carried a [[Nether Scrolls|Nether Scroll]] with the ''alter beast'' spell.
